description:
• Are you a beginner and willing to step into the music world and want to make your career/hobby as Music? Then this course is for you!
  • Learn and get knowledge on the basic theory and lessons in Carnatic Music.
  • Parents who want their kids to start learning music can also enroll for this course.
  • This course is taught in a simple manner with vocal voice clips so that the you can practice along with the tutor.
  • The videos in this course contain the lyrics and voice clip demonstrations of lessons in Carnatic Music so that you don't need any extra materials, you can just learn everything from the videos.
  • Build your voice from base, medium to high pitch by practicing these basic lessons.
  • Once you are familiar with these lessons, you will be able to step into next advanced levels very easily.
  • At the end of this course, you will gain a very good knowledge on basic lessons in Carnatic Music and you will be able to sing and tune your voice in different voice ranges.
title: Basic Carnatic Music Lessons
